name: Science Club
description: Explore the wonders of physics, chemistry, and biology with hands-on experiments.

name: Art Club
description: Express your creativity through drawing, painting, and digital art.

name: Robotics Club
description: Build, code, and compete with student-made robots in exciting challenges.

name: Drama Club
description: Act, direct, and perform! Join a community of passionate performers.

name: Chess Club
description: Sharpen your mind and compete in tournaments with fellow strategists.

name: Photography Club
description: Capture the world through your lens and learn professional photography skills.

name: Music Club
description: Join fellow musicians to jam, compose, and perform in concerts and events.

name: Environmental Club
description: Promote sustainability through projects, cleanups, and environmental advocacy.

name: Debate Club
description: Sharpen your public speaking and critical thinking skills by debating current topics.

name: Coding Club
description: Learn programming languages, create apps, and participate in coding competitions.
